title: Hello! I’m Max Bonetati
text:
Snowboarding at Mammoth Mountain!



Hello! I’m Max Bonetati
Welcome to my personal website. I’m currently an Environmental Studies student at UCSB, passionate about renewable energy, photography, and outdoor adventures.
I’m passionate about the intersection between climate action and hands-on work in the field. Specifically micro-grids, solar PV systems (especially organic), and sustainable energy solutions. I’ve worked on research and technical projects involving data analysis, mapping tools, and some ecological fieldwork.
In my free time, you’ll find me hiking, backpacking, or out in the snow.

title: Project
text:
Me on a hike





I’m an Environmental Studies major at UCSB, passionate about renewable energy and climate action. I enjoy working on projects that combine fieldwork with data visualization, especially in microgrid planning and solar deployment.
